content.query:
---------Geologia---------

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 01
-----------------------------------------------
SELECT TOP (10) *
From OPENROWSET (BULK '/master/data/m_geo1.parquet',
DATA_SOURCE= 'ExternalUPDataSource',
FORMAT ='PARQUET')  AS [file]
GO;

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 02
-----------------------------------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE master_party.dim_geo(
    Estimacion nvarchar(250),
    Estatus nvarchar(250),
    NombredeEstructura nvarchar(250),
    FullYearBudget FLOAT,
    BudgetYTDApril FLOAT,
    ActualYTDApril FLOAT,
    Detalle nvarchar(250),
    Observacion nvarchar(250),
    actualvsfullyear FLOAT,
    actualvsbudget FLOAT
)
 WITH (
     LOCATION = '/master/data/m_geo1.parquet',
     DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
     FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
 )
GO


-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 03
-----------------------------------------------
select top(10) * from master_party.dim_geo

-----------------------------------------------
--Paso 04
-----------------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE business_knowa.bi_geo 
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/business/tf/bi_geo/',
    DATA_SOURCE = ExternalUPDataSource,  
    FILE_FORMAT = UPParquetFileFormat
) AS 
SELECT * from master_party.dim_geo;

SELECT * from business_knowa.bi_geo;
